title: TailwindCSS
description: A visual guide on using TailWindCSS

body.raw:
# Simple Guide for Using Tailwind CSS in HTML This is a simple guide for using Tailwind CSS in HTML. ```html My Tailwind CSS Example

Welcome to My Tailwind CSS Example

This is a simple guide for using Tailwind CSS in HTML.

``` In this example, we have an HTML file that includes a basic structure with a title, stylesheet link, and a simple layout using Tailwind CSS classes. We include the Tailwind CSS stylesheet by adding the `` tag in the `` section of the HTML file. You can use the CDN link provided or install Tailwind CSS locally and reference the file accordingly. Inside the `` tag, we have a container (`
`) that centers the content horizontally, adds some padding, and sets the maximum width. We use Tailwind CSS utility classes to style the elements: The `

` heading has classes `text-4xl`, `font-bold`, and `text-center` to set the font size, font weight, and alignment, respectively. The `

` paragraph has the `text-lg` class to set the font size and `mt-4` to add top margin. The `
